q_en: How many sewing tasks did Skilled Sewers complete before June 2024, and what types of products were produced for these sewing tasks?
gt:
Hey there! ğŸ˜„ Let's dive into the details of the sewing tasks completed by the "Skilled Sewers" before June 2024.

### Sewing Tasks Completed

| Task ID | Order Product ID |
|---------|------------------|
| 17      | 17               |
| 18      | 18               |

Unfortunately, there was a hiccup when trying to retrieve the product types for these tasks. It seems there was an issue with the SQL query, so I couldn't fetch the exact types of products produced. ğŸ˜…

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Skilled Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for "Skilled Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id, order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '7' AND status = 2 AND end_time < '2024-06-01';
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing task IDs and order product IDs for tasks completed by "Skilled Sewers" before June 2024

steps.sql: SELECT order_product_id, product_id FROM order_product WHERE id IN (17, 18);
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs and quantities for the completed sewing tasks

steps.sql: SELECT DISTINCT pt.description FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN ();
steps.description: Retrieve the product types for the products produced in these sewing tasks
steps.results: (1064, "You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ')' at line 1")
